dcterms:description: A dataset comprised of event data, frame-based RGB data, and Controller Area Network (CAN) bus data which include throttle, brake, speed, steering angle, and torque values collected using Robot Operating System (ROS) framework.
dcterms:title: Our Collected Dataset

dcterms:creator: Y. Hu
J. Binas
D. Neil
S.-C. Liu
T. Delbruck
dcterms:description: The Davis Driving Dataset (DDD) is one of the most extensive datasets collected using a DAVIS camera, providing a concurrent stream of events and active pixel sensor data, including vehicle human control data collected for approximately 51 hours of driving under various conditions.
dcterms:title: Davis Driving Dataset (DDD)

dcterms:creator: D. Gehrig
M. Rüegg
M. Gehrig
J. Hidalgo-Carrión
D. Scaramuzza
dcterms:description: EventScape is a large-scale synthetic dataset recorded through the CARLA simulator, which includes event data frames, frame-based RGB images, and vehicle control data collected under various environmental conditions.
dcterms:title: Carla EventScape Dataset
